articles.author: Alex Isenstadt
articles.title: Scoop: Trump hosting "everyday Americans" to squeeze GOP holdouts - Axios
articles.description: "To my friends in the Senate, lock yourself in a room if you must," Trump posted.
articles.content: <ul><li>"Any Democrat or Republican that votes against the bill, is voting for a massive tax hike on everyday Americans," an administration official tells Axios. "The One, Big, Beautiful Bill codifie… [+1484 chars]
